com.android.io

类 HucDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.io.HucDownloader

  • public class HucDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Relin on 2018/9/19.
    下载助手可以帮助你简单的调用函数进行下载，同时如果你需要自定义下载网络的方式，
    只需要继承该类然后重写download方法，在获取到文件流之后调用doHttpResponse（）
    处理对应逻辑就行了。
    download assistant can help you simply calling a function for download, at the same time,< br / > if you need a custom download network way, < br / > only needs to inherit the class and then rewrite the download method,< br / > after the access to file stream call doHttpResponse () < br / > handle corresponding logic. < br / >
